name: b-form-manager
desc: BOA Form Manage library for managing forms on BOA One.

parameters.name: data
parameters.desc: this data will be pass to screen which will be open.

parameters.name: showAsNewPage
parameters.desc: if this is true, screen will be open as a new tab.

parameters.name: menuItemSuffix
parameters.desc: if this is not null, this will be add to screen name.

parameters.name: data
parameters.desc: this data will be pass to screen which will be open.

parameters.name: title
parameters.desc: Title of opened dialog. If is not set, take resource name by default.

parameters.name: onClose
parameters.desc: Close callback function of dialog page.

infoArray.name: getResourceInfo(resourceId, resourceCode, callback)
infoArray.desc: use FormManager.getResourceInfo() to get screen resource info.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.desc: this parametere must be not null, because this function will be call when transaction will be done

infoArray.name: getResourceInfoByPath(path, callback)
infoArray.desc: use FormManager.getResourceInfoByPath() to get screen resource info.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.desc: this parametere must be not null, because this function will be call when transaction will be done

infoArray.name: getTabList()
infoArray.desc: use FormManager.getTabList() to get opened tab list.
